Option

public Option(char shortName,
              java.lang.String longName,
              java.lang.String label,
              java.lang.String description)
Parameters:
shortName - Short name of the option; 'f' means it can be set using "-f" on the command line
longName - Long name of the option; can be used as "-longName" on the command line or using a property "myapp.longName" in the property file.
